text:
Xarunta adeegga muwaadiniinta (borgerservice) ee magaaladaada ayaa diyaarin
karta sidii dad kale loogu rukhsayn lahaa in ay akhriyaan sanduuqaaga waraaqaha
ee dijital ah - Boostada Dijital ah
Foomkani waa turjumaadda Soomaali ee FD 011. Waa FD 011, ee waajib ah in la buuxiyo oo loo dhiibo xarunta adeegga muwaadiniinta
(borgerservice)

Waa maxay rukhsaynta akhrisku?
Guud ahaan, masuuliyiinta dawladda ee Denmark waxay dhammaan waraaqaha boostada u diraan sanduuqa waraaqaha ee dijital ah
ee muwaadiniinta - Boostada Dijital ah. Dad kale ayaad u oggolaan kartaa in loo rukhseeyo in ay kuu akhriyaan waraaqaha kuugu jira
Boostada Dijital ah haddii aad u baahan tahay in lagaa caawiyo in aad akhrisato waraaqahaaga boostada ee dijital ah, ama haddii aad
rabto uun in aad qof kale u oggolaato in loo rukhseeyo in uu kuu akhriyo waraaqaha dijital ah ee kaaga yimid masuuliyiinta dawladda.
Qof ama shirkad ayaad u oggolaan kartaa in akhriska loo rukhseeyo. Waxuu qofkaasi noqon karaa xaaskaaga ama ninkaaga,
ilmahaaga, qof aad saaxiibbo tihiin ama lataliye xirfadle ah. Rukhsaynta akhriska waqtigeedu xad ma leh, markaa waxay soconaysaa
ilaa aad dib u tirtirto rukhsaynta akhriska. Dhowr qof ama shirkadood ayaad u oggolaan kartaa in akhriska loo rukhseeyo, hase
yeeshee toban kama badnaan karaan.

Iskaa u diyaari rukhsaynta akhriska
Laftigaaga ayaa dadka kale u diyaarin kara rukhsaynta akhriska. Boostada Dijital ah ku gal saxiixaaga dijital ah ee NemID waxaanad
ku qortaa lambarka diiwaangelinta shacabka (CPR-nummer) ee qofka loo rukhsaynayo. Haddii rukhsaynta akhriska loo diyaarinayo
shirkad, ku qor lambarka diiwaangelinta ganacsiga (CVR-nummer) ee shirkadda akhriska loo rukhsaynayo.

Xarunta adeegga muwaadiniinta (borgerservice) ayaa diyaarin karta rukhsaynta akhriska.
Haddii aadan laftigaagu diyaarin karin rukhsaynta akhriska, xarunta adeegga muwaadiniinta (borgerservice) ayaa ku caawin karta:
1. Waxaad tagi kartaa xarunta adeegga muwaadiniinta (borgerservice) ee magaaladaada waxaana lagaa caawin karaa in aad
oggolaato rukhsaynta akhriska. Soo qaado caddaynta aqoonsiga (fiiri qaybta Caddaynta aqoonsiga ee la isticmaali karo). Waa in
aad weliba soo qaaddo magaca iyo lambarka diiwaangelinta shacabka (CPR-nummer) ee qofka akhriska loo rukhsaynayo, ama
magaca iyo lambarka diiwaangelinta ganacsiga (CVR-nummer) haddii shirkad loo rukhsaynayo.
2. Haddii aadan iman karin xarunta adeegga muwaadiniinta (borgerservice) ee magaaladaada, waxaad awoodda qareenimo siin
kartaa qofka akhriska loo rukhsaynayo, si qofkaasi u tagi karo xarunta adeegga muwaadiniinta (borgerservice) una diyaarin karo
rukhsaynta akhriska. Waa in qofka haya awoodda qareenimo - qofka akhriska loo rukhsaynayo - uu tago xarunta adeegga
muwaadiniinta (borgerservice) ee magaaladaada isagoo sitta awoodda qareenimo waana in uu soo qaatto caddaynta aqoonsigiisa
(fiiri qaybta Caddaynta aqoonsiga ee la isticmaali karo). Haddii akhriska shirkad loo rukhsaynayo, waa in wakiilka shirkaddu uu
weliba muujiyo dukumeenti tilmaamaya in uu shirkadda ku xiran yahay. Boostada Dijital ah kama heli doontid farriin laguugu
sheegayo haddii rukhsaynta akhriska la diyaariyey iyo goorta la diyaariyey. Hase yeeshee, Boostada Dijital ah ayaad ka eegi kartaa
cidda akhriska loo rukhseeyey.

Sidee ayay aniga ii saamaynaysaa rukhsaynta akhriska ee aan qof kale u oggolaaday?
Inkastoo aad qof kale u oggolaatay in akhriska loo rukhseeyo, waxaad xaq u yeelan doontaa, oo waajib kaa saaran yahay, waraaqaha
laguugu soo diro Boostada Dijital ah. Waxay taasi hirgelaysaa iyadoon la eegayn haddii laftigaagu aad waraaqahaaga akhrisay, qofka
akhriska loo rukhseeyey uu waraaqaha kuu akhriyey, ama midkiin uusan waraaqahaaga akhrinin. Magaalada ama masuuliyiinta kalee
dawladdu xaq u ma leh waajibna kuma aha in ay fiiriyaan haddii waraaqaha kuugu jira Boostada Dijital ah la akhriyey. Xaaladdaasi
waxay si sax ah ula siman tahay marka waraaqaha laguugu soo rido sanduuqaaga dhab ah ee waraaqaha lagu rido.
Sidaas darteed, qofka aad u oggolaanayso in akhriska loo rukhseeyo waa in aad kala heshiiso sida lagaaga soo wargelin doono waxa
ay kuu soo qoreen masuuliyiinta dawladdu, haddii aadan si joogto ah waraaqahaaga u akhrisanin. Waa in aad weliba ka war hayso
haddii aad shirkad u oggolaatay in akhriska loo rukhseeyo, in shirkadda laftigeedu ay ka go’aan gaari karto qofka shirkadda ka mid ah
ee waraaqaha kuu akhrinaya.

Tirtiridda rukhsaynta akhriska
1. Adiga laftigaaga ayaa geli kara Boostada Dijital ah oo hab dijital ah kaga saari kara rukhsaynta akhriska.
2. Qofka ama shirkadda ayaad weydiisan kartaa in hab dijital ah ay ku saaraan rukhsaynta akhriska ee loo sameeyey.
3. Waxaad tagi kartaa xarunta adeegga muwaadiniinta (borgerservice) ee magaaladaada waxaana lagaa caawin karaa in aad
. meesha
ka saarto rukhsaynta akhriska. Soo qaado caddaynta aqoonsiga (fiiri qaybta Caddaynta aqoonsiga ee la isticmaali karo)
Ogsoonow in dadka akhriska loo rukhseeyey ay iskood u tirtiri karaan rukhsaynta akhriska ee loo sameeyey iyadoon la eegayn haddii
aad iyaga weydiisatay in ay sidaas sameeyaan iyo haddii kale. Boostada Dijital ah farriin kama heli doontid haddii la tirtiray rukhsaynta
akhriska iyo goorta la tirtiray, laakiin Boostada Dijital ah ayaad ka eegi kartaa cidda loo rukhseeyey akhriska sanduuqaaga waraaqaha
ee dijital ah.

Warbixin dheeraad ah oo ku saabsan Boostada Dijital ah
Si aad warbixin dheeraad ah uga hesho Boostada Dijital ah iyo fursadaha kuu diyaar ah tag halkan www.borger.dk ama la xiriir xarunta
adeegga muwaadiniinta (borgerservice) ee magaaladaada.

Caddaynta aqoonsiga ee la isticmaali karo
Marka aad tagto xarunta adeegga muwaadiniinta (borgerservice) si aad u diyaariso ama u tirtirto rukhsaynta akhriska Boostada Dijital
ah, waa in aad muujiso caddayn aqoonsi oo wadata sawir iyo lambarka diiwaangelinta shacabka (CPR-nummer). Waxay taasi noqon
kartaa baasaboor ama laysinka baabuurta. Haddii aadan haysan baasaboor ama laysinka baabuurta, waxaad soo qaadan kartaa
waraaqo kaloo aqoonsi oo wada socda, sida marka aad xarunta adeegga muwaadiniinta (borgerservice) isaga qorto saxiixa dijital ah
ee NemID, www.NemId.nu ka fiiri wixii ku saabsan caddaynta aqoonsiga ee la isticmaali karo. Haddii uu shaki kaaga jiro, waqti hore la
xiriir xarunta adeegga muwaadiniinta (borgerservice).

FD 011_SOM (09/2014)
Waxaa soo saartay Hay’adda Denmark ee Dijital gelinta

Bogga 1 ee 2

 Waa in magaaladu ay buuxiso
Xarunta adeegga muwaadiniinta (borgerservice) ee magaaladaada

Taariikhda la helay

Aqoonsiga la bixiyey
Aqoonsiga la fiiriyey

KLE 23.15.15G01 • Aqoonsiga kiiska
Xuruufta magaca ugu horraysa

Awoodda qareenimo ee lagu diyaariyo rukhsaynta akhriska Boostada Dijital ah ee loo sameeyo qof
ama shirkad
tix. Sharciga Boostada Dijital ah ee Dadweynaha ee Denmark
Foomkani waa turjumaadda Soomaali ee FD 011. Waa FD 011, ee waajib ah in la buuxiyo oo loo dhiibo xarunta adeegga muwaadiniinta (borgerservice).

Waxaan halkan awoodda qareenimo ee lagu diyaariyo rukhsaynta akhriska waraaqaha iigu jira Boostada Dijital ah ku
siinayaa
Magaca - Qofka haya awoodda qareenimo ama qofka loo samaynayo rukhsaynta akhriska

Lambarka diiwaangelinta shacabka
(CPR-nummer) ama Lambarkadii-waan
gelinta ganacsiga (CPR-nummer)

Bayaanka iyo saxiixa
Waxaan halkan ku sheegayaa in aan akhristay oo aan fahmay warbixinta ku saabsan Boostada Dijital ah iyo rukhsaynta akhriska ee
ku xusan qodobka/§ 13aad ee Amarka Fulinta ee hoose kuna qayaxan xeerasha lagu hagayo awooddaas qareenimo ee ku yaalla
bogga 1aad. Waxaan si gaar ah uga war hayaa in aan weli xaq u leeyahay, oo waajib iga saaran yahay, waraaqaha iigu jira Boostada
Dijital ah iyadoon la eegayn haddii aan qof kale u oggolaaday in akhriska loo rukhseeyo iyo haddii kale.
Magaca - Qofka ugu muhiimsan ee haya sanduuqa waraaqaha ee dijital ah

Taariikhda

Lambarka diiwaangelinta shacabka
(CPR-nummer)

Saxiixa

Qofka awoodda qareenimo loogu samaynayo rukhsaynta akhrisku waa in uu awoodda qareenimo booqasho ugu geeyo xarunta
adeegga muwaadiniinta (borgerservice) ee magaaladaada.
Qofka haya awoodda qareenimo waa in uu soo qaado caddaynta aqoonsiga (fiiri qaybta Caddaynta aqoonsiga ee la isticmaali karo).
Haddii awoodda qareenimo shirkad la siiyey, waa in wakiilka shirkaddu uu weliba muujiyo dukumeenti tilmaamaya in uu shirkadda ku
xiran yahay.
Macluumaadka ku saabsan qofka loo rukhseeyey akhriska Boostada Dijital ah waxaa lagu diiwaangelin doonaa magaalada iyo
Boostada Dijital ah. Macluumaadkaas waxaa loo gudbin doonaa oo keliya masuuliyiinta kale ee dawladda, shirkadaha iwm ee iyagu
sharci ahaan xaq u leh macluumaadka ama hawlo ku qabta magaca magaalada iyo Boostada Dijital ah. Waxaad xaq u leedahay in
aad ogaato macluumaadka magaaladu ay adiga kaa hayso. Waxaad codsan kartaa in macluumaadka qalad ah la saxo.

Qaybaha laga soo qaatay Amarka Fulinta ee ku saabsan ka reebidda dadka caadi ah in ay is qoraan Boostada Dijital
ah ee Dadweynaha iwm.
Qaybta 5
Rukhsaynta akhriska ee loo sameeyo dad kale
§ 13. Qofka caadi ah ee is qoray Boostada Dijital ah marka uu tago
xafiiska magaalada uu qofkaasi joogo ama markii ugu dambaysay qornaa
waxuu qof kaloo caadi ah ama urur sharci ah u oggolaan karaa in loo
rukhseeyo akhriska waraaqaha qofkaas loo soo diray ama ka yimid ee ku
jira Boostada Dijital ah. Qofka caadi ah ee rukhsaynta akhriska samaynaya
waa in uu keeno caddaynta aqoonsiga sida ku xusan qodobka hoose
stk. 9. Waa in qofkaasi uu sheego magaca iyo lambarka diiwaangelinta
shacabka (CPR-nummer) ee qofka caadi ah ama magaca iyo lambarka
diiwaangelinta ganacsiga (CVR-nummer) ee ururka sharci ah ee akhriska
loo rukhsaynayo.
Stk. 2. Qofka caadi ah waxuu awoodda qareenimo qof kale ugu
oggolaan karaa in uu booqasho ku tago xafiiska magaalada si qofkaas
ama urur sharci ah akhriska loogu rukhseeyo. Qofka imanaya waa in uu
dhiibo awoodda qareenimo uuna bixiyo caddaynta aqoonsiga sida ku
qayaxan qodobka hoose stk. 9. Haddii qofka imanaya uu wakiil ka yahay
urur sharci ah, waa in qofkaasi uu weliba bixiyo dukumeenti tilmaamaya
in uu ururka sharci ah ku xiran yahay. Waa in la isticmaalo foomka lagu
diyaariyo rukhsaynta akhriska ee ay tilmaameen golaha magaaladu marka
awoodda qareenimo la bixinayo. Golaha magaalada ayaa oggolaan kara
in awoodda qareenimo lagu bixiyo hab kale oo aanan ahayn bayaanka
wakiileed ee la soo tilmaamay.
Stk. 3. Dhowr qof oo caadi ah ama dhowr urur oo sharci ah ayaa
akhriska loo rukhsayn karaa marka la raaco qodobka hoose stk. 1. Hase
yeeshee, rukhsaynta akhriska looma diiwaangelin karo in ka badan 10 qof.
Stk.
4.
Rukhsaynta
akhriska
waxaa
hab
elektaroonig
ah
loogu
diiwaangelin
doonaa
xalka
boostada
waxayna
hirgeli doontaa ilaa la burinayo ama la tirtirayo, tix. qodobka hoose stk. 5.
Stk. 5. Qofka oggolaaday in qof kale akhriska loo rukhseeyo, tix.
qodobbada hoose stk.1 iyo 2, waxuu rukhsayntaas burin karaa waqti
kastoo uu rabo marka uu tago xafiiska magaalada isagoona keenaya

kaarka caymiska caafimaadka (sundhedskort) ama caddaynta kalee
aqoonsiga ee loo baahan yahay, ama marka uu xalka boostada ku galo
saxiixa dijital ah ee lagu rukhsaynayo gelitaanka xalka ee uu tirtiro rukhsaynta
akhriska. Dad kale ayaa weliba burin kara rukhsaynta akhriska marka
ay soo xaadiraan ama keenaan awoodda qareenimo iyagoo weliba
muujinaya kaarka caymiska caafimaadka (sundhedskort) ama caddaynta
kalee aqoonsiga ee loo baahan yahay. Burinta waxaa hab elektaroonig ah
loogu diiwaangelin doonaa xalka Boostada Dijital ah.
Stk. 6. Qofkii kastee akhriska looga rukhseeyey xafiiska magaalada,
tix. qodobbada hoose stk.1 iyo 2, ayaa akhrin kara oo nidaamin kara
waraaqaha ku jira boostada dijital ah, isagoo xataa samayn kara galal
dijital ah.
Stk. 7. Qofkii kastee akhriska loo rukhseeyey ayaa rukhsayntaas tirtiri
kara.
Stk. 8. Rukhsaynta akhriska ee urur sharci ah loo sameeyey waxay
ka dhigan tahay in ururka sharci ah uu ka go’aan gaari doono haddii
rukhsaynta akhriska loo samayn doono qof ama dhammaan dadka uu
ururka sharci ah u rukhseeyey in ay isticmaalaan sanduuqa waraaqaha
dijital ah ee ururka sharci ah uu ku leeyahay Boostada Dijital ah.
Stk. 9. Haddii rukhsaynta akhriska laga sameeyo xafiiska magaalada
iyadoo la raacayo qodobbada hoose stk. 1 iyo 2, waa in qofka caadi
ah ama wakiilkiisu uu keeno caddaynta aqoonsiga ee ku habboon
caddaynta aqoonsiga ee loo baahan yahay si loo bixiyo saxiixa dijital ah ee
dadweynaha isagoo tagaya xafiiska masuuliyiinta dawladda ee ah
masuuliyiinta diiwaangelinta ee ku lug leh bixinta saxiixa dijital ah ee
dadweynaha.
Stk. 10. Inkastoo qof caadi ah uu oggolaaday in qof kale akhriska loo
rukhseeyo, waraaqaha ku jira boostada dijital ah waxaa laga soo qaadi
doonaa in loo geeyey qofka rukhsaynta akhriska sameeyey. Qofkaas caadi
ah ayaa ka masuul noqon doona qofka ama shirkadda loo rukhseeyey
gelitaanka sanduuqa waraaqaha dijital ah.

FD 011_SOM (09/2014)
Waxaa soo saartay Hay’adda Denmark ee Dijital gelinta
